scripts.pretest:ios: bash scripts/ios/ensure-appium.sh && bash scripts/ios/setup-app.sh && bash scripts/ios/boot-sim.sh
scripts.wdio:ios:auth:first: wdio run ./wdio.ios.conf.js --spec ./test/specs/iOS/authentication.e2e.js --mochaOpts.grep "user should be able to authorize in the app for the first time"
scripts.wdio:ios:auth:two: wdio run ./wdio.ios.conf.js --spec ./test/specs/iOS/authentication.e2e.js --mochaOpts.grep "first time|log in to the app"
scripts.wdio:ios:auth:three: wdio run ./wdio.ios.conf.js --spec ./test/specs/iOS/authentication.e2e.js --mochaOpts.grep "first time|log in to the app|Forgot code"
